title: What is the best platform to learn new skills online for free with certification? - Quora

response.answer_text: You’ll be pleased to hear you’ve got a few options to choose from.  Source Oxford Home Study College15 free online courses covering subjects ranging from Internet Marketing to Event Management.Free certification upon completion sent via email.Open2StudyPlenty of courses to choose from.Free informal qualification/credit upon completion to demonstrate your interest in learning about this area to potential employers or educational institutions.Google Digital GarageDigital skills that range from business marketing to social media strategy.Really nice layout and extremely easy to use.Free digital certificate upon completion.AlisonWhile the courses are free, there’s a fee to attain the certificate upon completion.Digital Certificate: €21 (£19/$26), Print Certificate: €27 (£24/$33), Framed Certificate: €37 (£33/$46).

There are many educational apps and websites which are good but personally I felt that https://witkali.com/ has some of the best contents which helps very much in online learning. About :- Founded by Naveen and Ashwin, bhRtya Automation Pvt. Ltd. is a start-up headquartered in Kadur, Karnataka, which is recognized by the Government of India. Features :- 1)Seal of quality 2)One price for similar courses 3)Experience lab at home Best courses:- 1)Artificial Neural Network and Its Applications 2)Intuition Behind Robotics for Beginners 3)Spoken English 4) Biology 5) Chemistry  6)NEET exam preparation And many more.. Link :- https://witkali.com/
